timeline.bodyText:
please make this a value object like GeminiTicker2 with private final fields
as this is (de)serialized as an array you don't have to annotate constructor args with JsonProperty - just make sure the orders is correct
timeline.author: walec51

timeline.message:
[Gemini] GeminiCandle fields can not be final (but we can use Lombok to simplify with @Data)
See Bitfinex LedgerEntry for similar implementation
